articles.description: Manchester United have taken a 32-man squad, including many first-team players, to Asia for two post-season friendlies.
articles.title: Manchester United fly out for post-season trip to Asia

articles.description: Kylian Mbappe won the European Golden Shoe for the first time after scoring twice in Real Madrid's 2-0 defeat of Real Sociedad on Saturday.
articles.title: Kylian Mbappe wins European Golden Shoe for first time

articles.description: BBC Sport chief football writer Phil McNulty reviews the Premier League season - and looks back to his August predictions.
articles.title: Phil McNulty's Premier League end of season review

articles.description: Follow live text and BBC 5 live radio commentary from the French Open at Roland-Garros, the second Grand Slam tournament of the year.
articles.title: French Open 2025 LIVE: Raducanu v Wang - tennis scores, results, radio & order of play at Roland Garros

articles.description: Lando Norris says getting pole position for the Monaco Grand Prix "was a bigger day for me" than winning the race on Sunday.
articles.title: Monaco Grand Prix: Lando Norris says win 'incredible' but pole position 'more emotional'

articles.description: Last summer, 30 BBC pundits were asked to pick which teams would finish in the Premier League's top four, and in which order. How did they get on?
articles.title: Premier League predictions: How accurate were BBC Sport pundits?

articles.description: Former Manchester United boss Erik ten Hag signs a two-year contract to succeed Xabi Alonso as Bayer Leverkusen head coach.
articles.title: Erik ten Hag: Bayer Leverkusen confirm ex-Manchester United boss as new head coach

articles.description: Aston Villa will complain to the Premier League after a "big mistake" by referee Thomas Bramall during a 2-0 loss at Man Utd.
articles.title: Aston Villa complain to Premier League after 'big mistake' at Old Trafford

articles.description: All the reaction to the final day of the Premier League season as Man City, Chelsea and Newcastle earn Champions League spots.
articles.title: Premier League reaction: Man City rescue season with Champions League place as De Bruyne departs

articles.description: The New York Knicks produce a stunning comeback for a first win in their NBA Eastern Conference play-off finals against the Indiana Pacers.
articles.title: Karl-Anthony Towns leads comeback as New York Knicks defeat Indiana Pacers
